tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE engagements (
  engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(10) CHECK(action IN ('like', 'comment')),
  CONSTRAINT fk_post FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES posts(post_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT
);
